item.title: Apple reaches deal with EU regulators to open up mobile payments system to rivals
item.description: EU antitrust chief Margrethe Vestager said the European Commission accepted commitments from Apple to open access to its tap and go payments tech to rivals.

item.title: What The Free Google Dark Web Report Will Soon Reveal About You - Forbes
item.description:
1. What The Free Google Dark Web Report Will Soon Reveal About You  Forbes
  2. Google is giving everyone free dark web monitoring. Here’s how to use it  Fast Company
  3. Google One ‘Dark web reports’ coming to all Google Account holders from late July  9to5Google
  4. Google’s dark web monitoring service will soon be free for all users  The Verge
  5. Google is making it easier to see if your info is on the dark web — here’s how  Tom's Guide

item.title: Exoplanet is first detected with potentially life-supporting atmosphere: NASA - New York Post
item.description:
1. Exoplanet is first detected with potentially life-supporting atmosphere: NASA  New York Post
  2. James Webb Space Telescope suggests this exoplanet is our 'best bet' at finding an alien ocean  Space.com
  3. Astronomers find surprising ice world in the habitable zone with JWST data  University of Michigan News
  4. Super Earth discovered. It could have oceans and may be habitable  India Today
  5. Telescope data suggests there is liquid water on ice planet  The Hill

item.title: Price drop: Get Microsoft Office Pro for life for only $39.97
item.description: Microsoft Office Pro 2021 gives you lifetime access to Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and more on one PC with no recurring costs.

item.title: Gain lifetime access to extensive Excel training for just $30
item.description: Through July 21, you can get this Microsoft Excel training bundle on sale for only $29.97.

item.title: Get a laptop for less: This elite refurbished HP machine is 21% off
item.description: This near-mint HP EliteBook refurbished laptop has a 14-hour battery life, zippy Intel processor, and 16GB RAM.

item.title: Get this wireless Bluetooth transmitter before your next flight for just $29.99
item.description: With the Mymanu Link Wireless Bluetooth Transmitter and Receiver you can improve the way you use wireless audio, all for $29.99 through July 21.

item.title: Get a MagSafe power bank for 37% off and charge up to six devices at once
item.description: Charge six devices simultaneously with the Flash Pro Plus graphene power bank with MagSafe compatibility, price-dropped to $199.97 (reg. $319) through July 21.

item.title: Webb telescope may have just revealed an alien world with air
item.description: Scientists pointed the James Webb Space Telescope at an exoplanet that could be a habitable world with air and liquid water.

item.title: What is the newest Xbox?
item.description: Xbox doesn't do the easy thing like PlayStation and just use numbers, so we have to work to figure out which Xbox is the newest.

item.title: The best Windows laptops of 2024: Put these models on your Prime Day shopping list
item.description: Mashable's hands-on guide to the best Windows laptops includes the HP Spectre x360 14, the Lenovo Slim 7i 14, and Asus Zenbook Duo.

item.title: The 8 best noise-cancelling headphones for flying in 2024
item.description: We tested the most popular noise-cancelling headphones and earbuds to find the best for flying. Shop our top picks during Prime Day 2024.
